'''''Dragonbolt Chronicles''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Mortal Travails: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect the entire "[[Fires of Autumn Twilight]]" series.

==Video Guides==
{{EVT
|video1   = https://youtu.be/KBWMH4bO8kw
|caption1 = How to get "Dragonbolt Chronicles" Achievement
}}

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the ''{{w|Dragonlance}}'' shared universe created by Laura and Tracy Hickman.
** The title of the series is a reference to the first novel set in the universe, ''{{w|Dragons of Autumn Twilight}}''.
